dict.acceptation: 爆炸，炸裂；爆发；扩张，激增；（感情，尤指愤怒的）突然爆发；

sent.orig: The explosion-proof, axial fun consists of explosion-proofing motor, fabellum and blasting tube, etc.
sent.trans: 防爆轴流风机由防爆电机、叶片、风筒等部件组成。

sent.orig: In explosion phase, the super-critical exothermic model material was established, and the explosion time was studied.
sent.trans: 在爆炸阶段建立绝对超临界化学放热模型，求解爆炸时间。

sent.orig: The process of explosion condensation mineralization concealed explosion breccia mass is expounded.
sent.trans: 论述了隐蔽爆破角砾岩体的爆破-冷凝-成矿过程。

sent.orig: Flameproof explosion-proof electrical equipment safety principle is realized through the flameproof explosion-proof security enclosure.
sent.trans: 隔爆型电气设备的防爆安全原理是通过隔爆外壳从而实现防爆安全。

sent.orig: A good explosion protection solution means comfortable vehicle, normal operation without any potential explosion risks.
sent.trans: 因此，好的防爆解决方案，是舒适的车辆、正常的运作、没有任何爆炸隐患。
